name: rss-danbrown
description: RSS is a self-hosted RSS reader and aggregator with mobile-friendly UI, folder support, and simple UI for reading and managing subscription feeds.
features: Feed aggregation: Subscribe to multiple RSS and Atom feeds in one place.
Folder organization: Group related feeds into folders for easier management.
Mobile friendly: Read feeds comfortably on smartphones and tablets.
Read/unread tracking: Mark articles as read automatically or manually.
Article search: Find specific articles across all subscribed feeds.
OPML import: Migrate feed subscriptions from other RSS readers.
Refresh control: Update feeds manually or on a schedule.
Starred items: Save important articles for later reference.
Clean interface: Focus on content with a minimal, distraction-free design.
Keyboard navigation: Browse feeds and articles efficiently with hotkeys.
Feed management: Add, remove, or edit feed subscriptions easily.
Privacy focused: Keep your reading habits private on your own server.
